query:
SELECT 
                    em.source_entity_type,
                    em.source_entity_id,
                    em.entity_type,
                    em.entity_id,
                    em.user_id,
                    em.created_at
                FROM comms_entity_mentions em
                WHERE em.entity_type = $1
                  AND em.entity_id  = $2
                  AND em.source_entity_type != 'message'
                ORDER BY em.created_at DESC
